data.headline: Senior UX Designer and Enterprise Architect
data.summary: Seasoned UX Designer and Enterprise Architect with over 15 years of experience in the corporate sector. Adept at bridging the gap between business requirements and technical solutions, delivering intuitive and user-centric digital experiences.

experience.title: Senior UX Designer and Enterprise Architect
bullets: Designed and implemented user-centric enterprise software solutions for global manufacturing clients
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to align business requirements with technical feasibility
Conducted user research, created wireframes, and developed interactive prototypes to validate design concepts
Established enterprise-wide design standards and guidelines to ensure consistent user experiences
Provided architectural guidance and technical leadership for complex IT systems and infrastructure

experience.title: UX Designer and Enterprise Architect
bullets: Designed and developed user interfaces for enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems
Analyzed business processes and translated them into intuitive digital workflows
Conducted user testing and iteratively improved design solutions based on feedback
Participated in the development of enterprise architecture models and roadmaps

projects.name: Enterprise UX Transformation
projects.description: Spearheaded the redesign of the company's enterprise software suite to improve user experience and adoption

projects.name: Enterprise Architecture Roadmap
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive enterprise architecture roadmap to guide the organization's digital transformation

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Anja Müller, a middle-aged woman with short brown hair, wearing a blue blazer and smiling confidently at the camera.
